original_title: Randy Savage Unreleased: The Unseen Matches of The Macho Man
overview: For the first time ever, never-before-released matches of “Macho Man” Randy Savage are being released from the vault for the WWE Universe’s viewing pleasure. Witness matchups against fellow WWE Hall of Famers, such as Yokozuna, Steve Austin, Ricky “The Dragon” Steamboat, “Nature Boy” Ric Flair, Jake “The Snake” Roberts, and so much more!
title: Randy Savage Unreleased: The Unseen Matches of The Macho Man
